TypeSignature.Value: public interface BuildingBlockGalleryContentControl : IDisposable, Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ContentControlBase, System.ComponentModel.IComponent, System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

.class public interface auto ansi abstract BuildingBlockGalleryContentControl implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ContentControlBase, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, class System.IDisposable, class System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

summary.span: 表示文档构建基块的库，用户可将其插入到文档。

span.span: Represents a gallery of document building blocks that users can insert into a document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A显示的列表*文档构建基块*用户可以将插入到文档。A displays a list of *document building blocks* that users can insert into a document. 文档构建基块是为了多次使用而创建的一段内容，例如共同的封面页、格式化表格或标头。A document building block is a piece of content that has been created to be used multiple times, such as a common cover page, a formatted table, or a header. 若要选择想要显示构建基块，使用和属性。To choose the building blocks that you want to display, use the and properties. 有关文档构建基块的详细信息，请参阅[Word 2007 中的开发人员的新增](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/74aa6688-65b3-4167-997d-131f26ad8f84)。For more information about document building blocks, see [What's New for Developers in Word 2007](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/74aa6688-65b3-4167-997d-131f26ad8f84). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 内容控件Content Controls 是八个类型的内容控件，可以使用设计文档和 Microsoft Office Word 中的模板之一。The is one of eight types of content controls that you can use to design documents and templates in Microsoft Office Word. 内容控件具有用户界面 (UI)，具有控制类似于窗体的输入。Content controls have a user interface (UI) that has controlled input like a form. 你可以使用内容控件来防止用户编辑受保护的部分的文档或模板，并还可以将内容控件绑定到数据源。You can use content controls to prevent users from editing protected sections of the document or template, and you can also bind content controls to a data source. 有关详细信息，请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md)。For more information, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md). ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加一个新到文档的开头。The following code example adds a new to the beginning of the document. 显示由 Microsoft Office Word 的公式构建基块。The displays equation building blocks that are provided by Microsoft Office Word. 此版本用于文档级自定义。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisDocument`中你的项目，然后调用类`AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection`方法从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#1)] 此版本用于针对应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisAddIn`中你的项目，然后调用类`AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection`方法从`ThisAddIn_Startup`方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project, and call the `AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个表示 Microsoft Office Word 当前实例的 。

span.span: Gets a that represents the current instance of Microsoft Office Word.

value.span: 一个表示 Microsoft Office Word 当前实例的 。

span.span: A that represents the current instance of Microsoft Office Word.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性公开有关 Word，应用于该实例的选项的当前实例的信息以及在实例中打开当前文档。The property exposes information about the current instance of Word, the options applied to that instance, and the current documents open within the instance.

summary.span: 获取或设置在 中显示的构造块的类别。

span.span: Gets or sets the category of the building blocks that are displayed in the .

value.span: 在 中显示的生成块的类别。

span.span: The category of the building blocks that are displayed in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有构建基块都所属的类别和一个库。All building blocks belong to a category and a gallery. 使用属性指定的构建基块，显示的类别。Use the property to specify the category of the building blocks that are displayed by the . 你可以设置到此属性的值`Built-In`或`General`类别定义的 Microsoft Office Word 中，也可以指定自定义的类别。You can set the value of this property to the `Built-In` or `General` categories defined by Microsoft Office Word, or you can specify a custom category. 若要指定的库中显示的构建基块，使用属性。To specify which gallery of building blocks to display in the , use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加一个新到文档的开头。The following code example adds a new to the beginning of the document. 显示由 Microsoft Office Word 的公式构建基块。The displays equation building blocks that are provided by Microsoft Office Word. 该示例设置属性`Built-In`类别。The example sets the property to the `Built-In` category. 此版本用于文档级自定义。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisDocument`中你的项目，然后调用类`AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection`方法从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#1)] 此版本用于针对应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisAddIn`中你的项目，然后调用类`AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection`方法从`ThisAddIn_Startup`方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project, and call the `AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在 中显示的生成块的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of the building blocks that are displayed in the .

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有构建基块都属于库和一个类别。All building blocks belong to a gallery and a category. 使用属性来指定哪些库中显示的构建基块。Use the property to specify which gallery of building blocks to display in the . A只能显示某些库的构建基块。A can display only certain galleries of building blocks. 属性可以设置只为以下值：The property can be set only to the following values: - `wdTypeAutoText` - `wdTypeCustom1` - `wdTypeCustom2` - `wdTypeCustom3` - `wdTypeCustom4` - `wdTypeCustom5` - `wdTypeCustomAutoText` - `wdTypeCustomEquations` - `wdTypeCustomQuickParts` - `wdTypeCustomTables` - `wdTypeEquations` - `wdTypeQuickParts` - `wdTypeTables` 指定的构建基块显示的类别，使用属性。To specify the category of building blocks that are displayed by the , use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加一个新到文档的开头。The following code example adds a new to the beginning of the document. 显示由 Microsoft Office Word 的公式构建基块。The displays equation building blocks that are provided by Microsoft Office Word. 该示例设置属性`wdTypeEquations`。The example sets the property to `wdTypeEquations`. 此版本用于文档级自定义。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisDocument`中你的项目，然后调用类`AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection`方法从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#1)] 此版本用于针对应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisAddIn`中你的项目，然后调用类`AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection`方法从`ThisAddIn_Startup`方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project, and call the `AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你使用方法时，原始保留在文档。When you use the method, the original remains on the document. 一份（包括所有文本和属性设置) 将添加到剪贴板。A copy of the , including all text and property settings, is added to the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在 Microsoft Office Word 中创建属性返回表示字符串的十六进制数 4d535744， `MSWD`。If the was created in Microsoft Office Word, the property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string `MSWD`. 此字符串是 Word 的四个字符创建者代码。This string is the four-character creator code for Word.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要阻止用户编辑的内容，使用属性。To prevent users from editing the contents of a , use the property. 有关如何使用若要保护的文档的一部分，请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md)和[如何： 使用内容控件保护文档的某些部分](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls.md)。For more information about how to use a to protect a part of a document, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md) and [How to: Protect Parts of Documents by Using Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要阻止用户删除从文档中，使用属性。To prevent users from deleting a from the document, use the property. 有关使用若要保护的文档的一部分，请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md)和[如何： 使用内容控件保护文档的某些部分](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls.md)。For more information about using a to protect a part of a document, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md) and [How to: Protect Parts of Documents by Using Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 父级是控件所在的对象。The parent of the is the object in which the control is contained. 例如，如果控件在文档的正文，则此属性将返回对象。For example, if the control is in the body of the document, this property will return a object. 要获取其父类的中包含或，使用属性。To get the parent of a that is contained in a or a , use the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和控件是可以包含嵌套的内容控件的内容控件的唯一类型。The and controls are the only types of content controls that can contain nested content controls.

summary.span: 获取或设置在用户操作或某个其他操作更改文本之前在 中显示的文本。

span.span: The text that is displayed in the control until the text is changed by a user action or some other operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户选择构建基块，或使用数据源的数据填充控件之前，将显示占位符文本。The placeholder text is displayed until a user selects a building block or the control is populated with data from a data source. 若要设置中的占位符文本或，使用方法。To set the placeholder text to text that is in a or a , use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加一个新到文档的开头。The following code example adds a new to the beginning of the document. 显示由 Microsoft Office Word 的公式构建基块。The displays equation building blocks that are provided by Microsoft Office Word. 该示例设置提示用户选择一个公式的字符串属性。The example sets the property to a string that prompts the user to choose an equation. 此版本用于文档级自定义。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisDocument`中你的项目，然后调用类`AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection`方法从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#1)] 此版本用于针对应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in. 若要使用此代码，将其粘贴到`ThisAddIn`中你的项目，然后调用类`AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection`方法从`ThisAddIn_Startup`方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project, and call the `AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问中的项的所有。Use the property to access all of the items in the . 你还可以使用此属性来访问控件中文本的格式设置和其他文本属性。You can also use this property to access the formatting of the text in the control and other text properties. 有关详细信息对象，请参阅[Word 对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/word-object-model-overview.md)。For more information about objects, see [Word Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/word-object-model-overview.md). 若要访问文本中显示，使用属性。To access only the text that is displayed in the , use the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetPlaceholderText (Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.BuildingBlock BuildingBlock = null, Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range Range = null, string Text = "");

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetPlaceholderText(class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.BuildingBlock BuildingBlock, class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range Range, string Text) cil managed

span.span: A that contains the placeholder text.

The placeholder text.

summary.span: 将 、 或字符串中的文本显示为 中的占位符文本。

span.span: Displays text that is in a , a , or a string as the placeholder text in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户选择构建基块，或使用数据源的数据填充控件之前，将显示占位符文本。The placeholder text is displayed until a user selects a building block or the control is populated with data from a data source. 在调用时使用唯一的参数之一方法。Only one of the parameters is used when you call the method. 如果指定多个参数，则 Microsoft Office Word 将使用第一个指定的参数。If more than one parameter is specified, Microsoft Office Word uses the first specified parameter. 如果所有参数都被都省略，占位符文本是空字符串。If all parameters are omitted, the placeholder text is an empty string. 若要获取的占位符文本，使用属性。To get the placeholder text of a , use the property. 你还可以使用此属性将占位符文本设置为一个字符串。You can also use this property to set the placeholder text to a string.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 当前是否显示占位符文本。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the is currently displaying placeholder text.

value.span: 如果 当前显示占位符文本，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is currently displaying placeholder text; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的文本之前会显示的占位符文本由用户操作或一些其他操作更改。The placeholder text is displayed until the text in the is changed by a user action or some other operation. 若要获取或设置占位符文本，请使用属性或方法。To get or set the placeholder text, use the property or the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性来存储与关联的字符串文档处于打开状态时。You can use the property to store a string that is associated with the while the document is open. 你可以使用方法以查找由其标记在内容控件。You can use the method to find a content control by its tag.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在编辑 时是否自动将该控件从文档中删除。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是`true`、当用户在控件中，键入或以编程方式更改控件中的文本自动删除。If the property is `true`, the is automatically deleted when the user types in the control, or when the text in the control is changed programmatically. 当自动从文档，该控件将保持在文档中的文本中删除。When the is automatically deleted from the document, the text in the control remains in the document.

summary.span: 获取或设置 的标题。

value.span: 的标题。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标题显示在边框当用户单击它。The title is displayed in the border of the when the user clicks it.
